member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost
member.summary: Represents a USB port that you can plug a USB storage device into.
member.remarks: This module enables you to use a USB Drive as a storage device, or to use a USB mouse as a pointing device. Although you can plug other types of USB devices into the USB host module, the Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer software only responds to these two device types. Other types of USB devices will not raise the events associated with this module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.summary: Called when a device is ejected.

The event arguments.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.USBDriveConnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB drive is connected to the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the inserted device is a USB drive.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.USBDriveDisconnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB drive is disconnected from the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the device that is being removed is a USB drive.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.MouseConnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB mouse device is connected to the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the device that is being connected is a USB mouse.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.MouseDisconnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB mouse device is disconnected to the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the device that is being removed is a USB mouse.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.KeyboardConnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB Keyboard device is connected to the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the device that is being connected is a USB Keyboard.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbHost.KeyboardDisconnected
member.summary: Raised when a USB Keyboard device is disconnected to the host.
member.remarks: Although you can plug various types of USB devices into the USB host module, this event is only raised when the device that is being removed is a USB Keyboard.
